ProductInfo.Features:
14MP Still Image Capture and Full 1080p HD Video
2.4 GHz Wi-Fi Downlink for Smartphones
5.8G Remote Controller (with Mobile Phone holder)
iOS/Android App for Monitoring/Control
Smartphone Mounts to Controller for FPV
GPS-Based Autopilot with Return to Home
Intelligent Orientation Control (IOC)
Supports Dual Flight Control Modes
LED Indicators & Low Voltage Protection
Self-Tightening Prop Design
Up to 25 Minutes Flying Time
Integrated HD camera with tilt function
WiFi Range Extender
Intelligent Flight Battery and Charger
Highly Efficient Self-Tightening Propellers
Remote Controlled Capture via Mobile Phones
Built-in anti-vibration gimbal with self-stability function
Low Latency Live Preview (0.1s)
ProductInfo.Name: DJI Phantom Vision 2 Quadcopter with Integrated FPV 14MP Camera + Rapid Charger + 8GB Memory + Photo America Bundle
